name: Penguinonium
description:
Penguins alone are weak, but Penguins together are strong! Gather the penguins and make your way to the top of the food chain! This is my first Brackeys GameJam submission. I hope you enjoy!

Controls:

WASD movement.

Pass your marker through penguins to herd them into your group.

Score/Costs:

(20 points) 2 penguins for bunnies

(70 points) 7 penguins for deer

(150 points) 15 penguins for wolves

(300 points) 30 penguins for Polar Bears

You lose when your penguin counter reaches 0.

Credits:

Game by: SusVilla Game Studios

Game Developer: lorrno.gameobject

SoundTrack: SusVilla Beats

Art assets bought through the Unity Asset Store.
